review: Does reviewing Red Robin locations get embarrassing for me after a while? Well, it hasn't happened yet, so hopefully not anytime soon. Is it a chain? Yes. Is it the best-est burger you've evar had!!!1? Probably not.  But they are really darn consistent when it comes to providing you with just what you like, complete with bottomless fries and a friendly waitperson.  Also, the Red Robin Rewards program is pretty darn good if you come here a few times a year. Plus: Free Birthday Burger!

Although red robin usually tickles my tastebuds enough to purchase their souper sandwich combine, the experience I had at the Smyrna location left me wondering if I stepped into.the twilight zone. The service was terrible and everyone seemed to be wearing/doing whatever they wanted to do. There was no order to this place. The food was decent as expected though.

I'm giving this place a 5 not only because of the food the food was execellent but of te good service by a. Young lady named julia.  Another thing don't try to sell your octoberfest burger in september it just doest make sense
By far my favorite burger chain.  Excellent service here in Smyrna.  I always get the Turkey Burger with the spicy chipotle sauce.  Great stuff.
